com.cinema.controller

Class ChooseSeanceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cinema.controller.ChooseSeanceController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BootInitializable, javafx.fxml.Initializable, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Component
public class ChooseSeanceController
extends java.lang.Object
implements BootInitializable
    Created by Damrod on 12.05.2017. ChooseSeanceController is a class that is binded with ChooseSeance.fxml and shows current movies with their seance and time
